pages.text: The $(item)Sorting Hoppers/$ acts like a normal hopper, except it prevents items being drawn from it if the $(item)Sorting Hoppers/$ can output them.$(br2)A column of $(item)Sorting Hoppers/$ pointed sideways will sort out items at each layer. This pairs well with the $(item)Hopper Filter/$ or $(item)Slotted Chest/s!
